title: Learn About MACRA – How 50 Years of Medicare Reporting Changes on January 1, 2018 at AHIMA
description: Bonnie Cassidy Managing Dir. of Clinical Financial Integration Advisory Services at nThrive and Michael Marron-Stearns, CEO and Founder of Apollo HIT, Apollo HIT to speak on "MACRA-How 50 years of Medicare Reporting Changes on January 1, 2018"

title: Are You Ready for MACRA? Start Collecting Your Data Now
description: Oct. 2 last day to begin collecting data to avoid a Medicare penalty

title: Join nThrive at the 2017 HFMA Florida Annual Fall Conference September 27th!
description:

feeding florida

title: AMA creates 'regulatory relief' dashboard to break down CMS' MACRA proposals
description: The American Medical Association released an online regulatory relief dashboard to track CMS' deregulation efforts.

title: Learn 3 ways to get a data analytics project off the ground
description: Check out how hospitals can ensure adequate returns on investment when deploying data analytics.

title: Ensuring Your EHR System Meets MACRA Requirements in 2017
description: Health IT certifications, EHR usability, and EHR optimization are key to meeting MACRA requirements.

title: Learn how to build a coding workforce from military veterans and the community at AHIMA
description: Tom Ormondroyd, President of Education and Analytics at nThrive, to speak on "Building a Community-Sourced Coding Workforce from Military Veterans and Other Nontraditional Sources"

title: CMS says it will change direction of CMMI
description: The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services is redesigning its innovation center to give providers greater flexibility in payment models.

title: Hospitals Are Investing in Innovation
description: AHA says nearly three-quarters of large healthcare organizations have either built an innovation center or have plans to do so soon.

title: MACRA Final Rule: Healthcare focuses on quality, healthier patients, and lower costs
description: Though developed with good intentions, MACRA adds new costs and complexities to healthcare providers.

title: A study was conducted and found that 87% of healthcare execs rank telehealth as a priority
description: More than half are already seeing success with improving outcomes and patient satisfaction while uncertain fate of the ACA appears to be making telemedicine more important. Click here to learn more!

title: How to pick the right provider partner for a value-based care arrangement
description: As the healthcare industry continues to move toward value-based delivery and payment models, payers must rethink the way they engage with provider partners.

title: Book a Demo at AHIMA!
description: Schedule a private appointment or demo today! Click here to learn more!

title: Join nThrive at the Becker's Annual Health IT Conference
description: On September 22, Brian Clubb, vice president of Product Management at nThrive is participating in a panel discussion. Don't miss out!

title: Learn 3 ways cognitive computing could aid value-based care
description: The ability of augmented intelligence to manage diverse sources of data to provide insights can help care managers focus their efforts.

title: Here are 6 ways to prepare staff for value-based reimbursement
description: Whether physicians like it or not, value-based reimbursement is here and everyone wants to play to win. Here's how to get medical staff – including physicians – on board with the rules.

title: Key Steps for Hospitals and Health Systems to Consider
description: New risk-based payment arrangements and performance measurement programs make managing the "total cost of care" essential.

title: Providers and payers find common ground sharing population health data
description: Provider and insurers may not always see eye to eye, but when it comes to analytics, especially around risk-based contracts, both can find common ground in shared population health data.

title: Learn how 5 key targets can help in value-based care
description: Healthcare organizations need deeper understanding of their operations, and how to improve them, to manage the shift in reimbursement. Click here to learn more!

title: Overcoming EHR Implementation Issues for Better HIT Infrastructure
description: Healthcare organizations are optimistic about analytics for population health despite EHR implementation and interoperability issues. Click here to learn more!

title: Not all physicians qualify for Medicare APMs
description: Although CMS has shown significant support to move Medicare payments to value-based care models, not all providers have access to an alternative payment model. Learn more here!

title: Providers still struggling to build community connections
description: As healthcare providers increase their population health management efforts, learning how to identify and sustain meaningful relationships with their community is still a struggle.

title: Patient Access Update on Changes
description: Aimee Newson, Sir. Director, Patient Access at nThrive, provides insight on how patient access frequently needs to update all employees across the entire department quickly. Click here to learn about some strategies for time-sensitive training.

title: RCM tip of the day: Invest in technology to manage denials
description: Andrew Woughter, senior vice president of product strategy at nThrive advises healthcare organizations to invest in technology to manage denials. Learn more here!

title: Why Clinical Data Integrity Matters for MACRA Success
description: Don't miss this compelling webinar on the importance of health information governance and clinical documentation integrity for MACRA success.

title: Patient Financial Experience and Patient Access Q&A
description: nThrive experts explain how patient access and financial services are impacting patient experience, especially with rising insurance deductibles.

title: CMS seeking answers on spreading the word about MACRA
description: The CMS said more work needs to be done to get the word out among providers about MACRA since there are still awareness gaps around the requirements of the law nine months into its rollout.

title: Studies Show Clinicians Are Not Ready For MACRA
description: Clinicians are not sufficiently familiar with the ins and outs of the law and how it will impact them. Click here to learn more.
